TopicTitle: Activity Streams: did editing them change?

Articles.Content:
So I want to edit my Unread Threads stream, by removing, or blocking the console forum... I can no longer find how to edit which forums you can turn on/off in your Streams...

Help??

The interface changed a little but you can still select which forums you want to see. Click "Content Types", select "Topics", and click the little gear icon to the right and an interface for selecting subforums will appear. Pic:

Ahhh... Thanx @Red Iron Crown ..  I guess I missed the little gear icons... I had set up the streams before that toolbar was introduced, and havent used it before...

EDIT: Actually, more my fault, as I'm using a custom Stylish theme, and the gear icons are a VERY light color, so I literally didnt see them... So anyone using Stylish themes, be aware some elements dont show up very well, I guess...
